hadiths.text: Narrated Nafi`:`Abdullah bin `Umar said, "Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, 'The people of Medina should assume Ihram from Dhul-Hulaifa; the people of Sham from Al-Juhfa; and the people of Najd from Qarn." And `Abdullah added, "I was informed that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) had said, 'The people of Yemen should assume Ihram from Yalamlam

chapter.ara-name: باب مِيقَاتِ أَهْلِ الْمَدِينَةِ وَلاَ يُهِلُّوا قَبْلَ ذِي الْحُلَيْفَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Miqat for the people of Al-Madina
